subject: Re: Update on the breakthru build

full_threads.body:
Thanks Chris. I have a stocktake spreadsheet that I'm about to email around to everyone now - we have been working on some more content over the weekend which I will send through in the morning.

If there's anything outstanding content-wise that is creating a major hold up for you guys let me know and we can prioritise this.

Touch base again soon.

Regards,

Joshua Cook​​​​

MARKETING MANAGER, BREAKTHRU

Level 2, 689 Ann Street

Fortitude Valley

Queensland

4006

Hi Josh,

Thanks for sharing and very excited to see the Breakthru project taking shape.

Confirming we have uploaded the supplied service and location content and we are currently working through the transfer of Blog content.

If there is anything I do to assist with the content side of things, please be sure to let me know. More than happy to jump on a Zoom call to go through a stocktake of content. 

As mentioned in Heath's previous Loom, we're starting to see the non-templated pages being built out as the content arrives. We'll continue to refine the various design and UX elements and we progress.

@heath 

Hi Josh,

Thanks for sharing and very excited to see the Breakthru project taking shape.

Confirming we have uploaded the supplied service and location content and we are currently working through the transfer of Blog content.

If there is anything I do to assist with the content side of things, please be sure to let me know.

As mentioned in Heath's Loom, we're starting to see the non-templated pages being built out as the content arrives. We'll continue to refine the various design and UX elements and we progress. Here are some early examples:
https://breakthruw.wolfiq.cloud/news/
https://breakthruw.wolfiq.cloud/contact-us/
https://breakthruw.wolfiq.cloud/breakthru-and-royal-rehab-open-fully-inclusive-cafe-breaking-grounds/

Thanks and speak soon,

- done uploading the copy provided for 'services' (7 items)
- done uploading the locations (26 items)
- blog post sample https://breakthruw.wolfiq.cloud/breakthru-and-royal-rehab-open-fully-inclusive-cafe-breaking-grounds/
> video file not yet uploaded
> images need to be edited to match the layout
- sample service page https://breakthruw.wolfiq.cloud/service/supported-independent-living-sil/
> featured images not yet uploaded
> icons for the 'Steps' section
- contact us page https://breakthruw.wolfiq.cloud/contact-us/
- news archive page https://breakthruw.wolfiq.cloud/news/
> filter/sort feature (pending)

18hours

Thanks,

Hi Josh,

As discussed, I have attached a template for you to update with the services copy. I have also shared a Google Doc with the same template if that is easier.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio
Rica Rosario Valencia moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
This is looking incredible, thanks so much Heath! Love seeing it all coming together. The templated section in the back end is looking great as well, very keen to start using that!

I know I'm slightly late to the party with our content, but please see the first batch attached. This includes 37 pages (14 service pages, 23 locations pages). We still have approx. 25 pages to come in another batch (including 17 house pages and a few more service pages) but hoping this will keep you guys busy while we sort that out early this week.

I'll also start working with our business development team and agree on what our referral form / contact form will look like so you can start building that in Gravity Forms as well.

With all that said I have two very minor questions/suggestions from your Loom:


  1. Are we able to slow down the animation when the story line draws in? I love it, but barely even notice it unless I'm paying close attention.

  2. For the service slider on location pages, is it possible to customise the order of these? We want to push some services harder than others in certain locations, so would like those at the very front of the slider if possible.

    1. Is it possible to make the slider bar at the bottom interactive and potentially add a button? Here's a loom of my own to show you what I mean





Thanks again and talk soon.

Regards,

Joshua Cook​​​​

Hi Josh, Bec and Ina,

Time for an end of week update!

Here is a video where I run through the areas we have been working on this week:
https://www.loom.com/share/ddad7f46086144fc88a60868309a8112?sid=5fc65fe6-10ba-4931-97a3-4816e78a9b8c

We mainly focused on the infrastructure and design of the Services, Properties and Locations pages. These sections will house the majority of the content.

Next up, we will focus on:

  1. Uploading the content when it is received
  2. Templating the Stories and News areas
  3. Creating the 'generic' pages, such as Contact and About Us
  4. Responsive view tweaking and fine tuning throughout

As mentioned, I will be away this week, but the team will be cracking on with the build. Glen, CC'd in, will be heading up the content upload, so Josh, when you send it through, please reply to all on this email. I will also be checking in daily with the team for any urgent requests.

I have also added you three as admins to the site so you can have a 'poke' around.
